Question.Subject: Easy Twitter question?
Question.Content:
I'm new to Twitter, so I'm not familiar with much. I was wondering, when someone talks to you, like "@[your username]" how can you tell? Do you get notified somehow? I never see that people are trying to talk to me until I search my username. How can I tell when someones talking to me?
Sorry, I'm a newbie.
Question.ChosenAnswer: When you log in and your on the home page, on the side bar you will see @[your username] click on that and all the people who are trying to talk to you will be in there i hope i helped =)

Answer.Content: When you log in and your on the home page, on the side bar you will see @[your username] click on that and all the people who are trying to talk to you will be in there i hope i helped =)
Answer.Reference: www.twitter.com my own experience with twitter =D
